column1: "Sales show a steady upward trend over recent months, indicating consistent demand growth. The Technology category is the strongest revenue contributor, while Furniture shows comparatively lower profit margins, suggesting higher costs or aggressive discounting. The West region leads in overall revenue, highlighting strong regional market performance. A key business risk is margin erosion in high-volume categories. Recommended actions include optimizing discount strategies for low-margin products, increasing focus on high-performing regions, and improving cost efficiency in underperforming categories."
